yakada prathirodhi wadabim saha jayagannata pamanak siyalu de lesa, ee nisa me siyalu sunuwisunu karamin podi kara nathi. 2:41 thawada, oba pada ha pa angiliwala mati ge mati ha yakada kotasak kotasak wiya dutu nisa, rajyaya beda wen karanu atha, namuth thawamath, yakada slip sita ehi sambhawaya ganna, oba yakada mati sita mati mishra dutu sita. 2:42 saha pa angiliwala ardha washayen yakada ha ardha mati men, rajadhaniye kotasak shakthimath kara gatha haki wanu atha kotasak thala atha. 2:43 thawama, oba yakada polowe sita mati mishra dutu nisa, owun aththenma minisa pawathena samaga ekwa eekabaddha wanu atha, namuth owun ekineka pilipadiya nohaki, yakada saha mati samaga mishra kala nohaki sema. 2:44 eheth, ee rajadhani dina thula, swargaye dewi kisidaka winasha nowana rajyayak dalwanu atha, ohuge rajyaya thawath janathawa wetha bhara kala nohaki wanu atha, eya podi kara nathi kara me siyalu rajyayan paribhojanaya karanu atha, mema rajyaye thaman sadakalika nagi atha. 2:45 oba dutu de anuwa, gala ath thorawa kanda iwath iri nisa, eya mati thala, saha yakada, ha piththala, ha ridi, ha ran, maha dewiyan wahanse me pasuwa sidu wanne kumakda raju penwa thibe.
